required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Primary Care in AURA for COVID-19
clinical_study.official_title: Primary Care in AURA for Covid-19: Implementation of a Regional Practice-based Surveillance Network

lead_sponsor.agency: Research on Healthcare Performance Lab U1290

clinical_study.source: Research on Healthcare Performance Lab U1290

brief_summary.textblock: As few data are available on the epidemiology of the COVID-19 in primary care, the project aims to implement a practice-based surveillance network based on multiprofessional health homes in the French region Auvergne-Rh√¥ne-Alpes (Aura), able to monitor the evolution of the current epidemic..

primary_outcome.measure: Estimation of the weekly incidence of COVID-19 confirmed cases
primary_outcome.description: Confirmed cases will be defined by the positivity of the detection of SARS-CoV-2 in RT-PCR and possibly by serology (for patients in whom a test is performed). The incidence rate of confirmed cases will be estimated from the number of new cases confirmed by a positive biological test reported in the patient population of the participating facilities.

clinical_study.condition: Primary Care Suspected and Confirmed Cases of COVID19

arm_group.description: The surveillance network is made of 200 health professionals from 85 practices

intervention.description: The surveillance network will collect data on all consecutive COVID-19 cases

study_pop.textblock: Patients consulting a health professional in primary care in the AURA region, by physical encounter, visio-consultation or telephone call, during the COVID-19 epidemics period

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Suspect or confirmed COVID-19 case consulting in primary care in the Aura region
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patient with a COVID-19 diagnosis excluded after clinical examination or investigation.
- Patient refusing to participate to the study

overall_official.affiliation: Research on Healthcare Performance Lab U1290
